title: I feel like zyra could be so much better
body: I love her, but I really believe her design could be majorly improved upon to represent her plants better. Her kit atm seems clunky tbh and she doesn’t have many options in terms of gameplay, please leave some thoughts I’d love to hear other people’s opinions

replies.body: i think her q should be a circle again just seemed more useful that way the shape now is mostly a gimmick

I see this a lot, I wasn’t around for her old q but I’ve seen it, not sure what to think but I did see a response from a dev here on the boards saying that they surveyed a group of players and they all preferred the new1 which is odd

The problem is they survey the people currently playing a champ, so obviously those people are more likely to like the current version of the champ.  I used to love playing Zyra mid, but that change in Q shape hit her waveclear fairly hard.

Their study also found that players want Zyra to stay support rather than mid, but again, that would be at least in part because the people currently playing her are the people playing her support.

She has a DPS kit but lacks any good way to actually DPS someone down without getting into melee range, and that isn't possible when she has some of the lowest base health in the game. She also lacks zoning for someone who plays like a control mage because they don't last for very long. Also, her Q should be able to be rotated around it's center axis by clicking and dragging the hitbox, it would help mid lane zyra clear minions without standing to the side of the wave since shes so immobile.

A vector cast Zyra Q...

Oh how happy I'd be.
This is a perfect summary, for someone who has to get close she’s so squishy

I would like for them to do away with the random spawning seeds and make it so she gets to upgrade one of her spells (only one)

Q: Upgrade: When Zyra gets 100% attack speed from items 
When Zyra's Thorn Spitter plants shoot a thron at Zyra's target when she auto attacks them doing 1/3rd her auto attack damage as magic damage.  This attack is counted as an auto attack and applies on hit effects and is in addition to the plants normal attack.  


W: Upgrade: When Zyra gets 100 AP from items 
Zyra's seeds last 30s longer and act as a ward.  When a unit dies near a seed or plant allies near the seed or plant gain regrowth. Double the effect if a Champion dies near by. Zyra also gains a Seed when a Large minion or monster dies near her and two seeds if a champion or epic monster.
Regrowth - Gain 150% hp regen and 75% mana regen for 3s.  

E: Upgrade: When Zyra gets 300 Hp from Items 
Zyra's Lasher Plants enrage for 3s if they attack a immobile champion.  They attack in a AOE around them and their slow is +30% for a total of 60%

Then change her Ult to do about 75% the damage it does now but creates a Zone for 6s.  The zone applies grounded and any plants spawned in the zone are enraged as well as plants already in the zone are healed to full.

Then make it so her Plants start out with 16 hps and lose 4hp/s for 3s.  Enraged plants have 32 hps.

She doesn't have a lot of options? Whut? I play her in literally every role, and she has no real build restrictions.
